Source.Name: libsigrok
Source.Summary: Provides an API for communication with signal analyzer devices
Source.Description: libsigrok is a shared library which provides the basic API for talking to various types of signal analyzers (such as logic analyzers, oscilloscopes, and multimeters) and reading/writing acquired data into various input/output file formats.
